title: Consumer Reports reveals 2026 top 10 auto brands: See the list
description: Ford's Lincoln was among Consumer Reports' top 10 brands to join affordable, mass market names like Subaru, Honda, Toyota and Hyundai.

description: The MR2 just moved one step closer to being official.

title: Subaru, BMW top Consumer Reports' top auto brands; Toyota named most reliable, with Tesla most improved
description: Consumer Reports named Subaru the top brand in its 2026 Overall Brand Report Card for the second year in a row, with BMW the runner-up, though the German brand scored highest in the luxury category.

title: Toyota Is Pouring Nearly Half A Billion Dollars Into This US State
description: Toyota is investing around $453 million into one specific U.S. state to ramp up its hybrid future. Find out which factory is getting the massive upgrade.

title: Engine Teardown Exposes What's Really Wrong With Toyota's Problematic V6
description: Toyota's 3.4-liter twin-turbo V6, known internally as the V35A-FTS, was designed to replace the long-running 5.7-liter V8 in many of the brand's most important vehicles. title: $5 Million Lawsuit Alleges Toyota Ignored Transmission Problems for a Decade
description: In America, if a consumer doesn't like the product, they have the right to explore legal recourse, and many do. Honda has been taken to court over steering issues, Ford is being sued due to a missing F-150 Lightning feature, and GM has to resort to legal counsel because of allegedly defective V8 ...
